Erowid name: methadone
Category: CHEMICALS
Field: MainPage

                    Text: 
                    Donate now and receive yours!

Methadone



COMMON & BRAND NAMES

Methadose; Dolophine; Symoron; Juice

EFFECTS CLASSIFICATION

Opioid; Analgesic

CHEMICAL NAME

6-dimethylamino-4,4-diphenyl-3-heptanone

DESCRIPTION

Methadone is a synthetic opiate derivative / opioid that is most commonly used as a maintenance treatment for heroin and opiate addiction.

BASICS

EFFECTS

IMAGES

HEALTH

LAW

DOSE

CHEMISTRY

GENERAL INFORMATION #

McDermotts Guide to the Depressant Drugs

Methadone & Drug Tests

Brief Info on Addiction

ARTICLES & WRITINGS #

, 1972

EXPERIENCES #

What Has Two Years of It Gotten Me?, by

Will You Marry Me?, by Bethany

Method Death, by Nog

Life Saving, by Josh

Completely Ecstatic, by rec_user

» » » MORE » » »

OFF-SITE RESOURCES

PRIMARY RESOURCES #

Drug Policy Alliance: Methadone

Methadone Today.org

Prescribing Methadone, Pursuing Abstinence

SECONDARY RESOURCES #

Methadone - Wikipedia.org

Methadone - TripSit.me


                    Context: 
                    This chunk provides detailed information about methadone, including its common names, chemical classification, chemical name, description, effects, and related resources. It is relevant within the larger webpage as part of the chemicals section, offering in-depth data on this opioid used for addiction treatment, and includes references, personal experiences, and external resources for further research.

MEDIA COVERAGE #

Citing Overdoses, Lawmakers Ask FDA for Stronger Warnings - JoinTogether, Jun 16, 2007

Join Together: Methadone News

FDA: Methadone Information
